articles.title: Sequoia Is Splitting Into Three VC Firms - Forbes
articles.description: Sequoia’s China and India and Southeast Asia funds are shedding their brand ties, becoming new firms HongShan and Peak XV Partners.
articles.content: The worlds most storied global venture capital firm is breaking itself up. Sequoia, known for early investments in U.S. tech companies such as Airbnb, WhatsApp and Zoom in the U.S., as well as intern… [+11439 chars]
